languageKey.label: "Secure Files" are files that are stored either in the database, or in the file system to ensure secure data storage.
The Administrator can configure the extension where to store the files uploaded here. You can add meta data to the files and categorize the entries.
tx_drblob_category
Enter a title for this record
The value entered here won't be the filename that is used when downloading the file. This is a mandatory field, so it has to be filled.
tx_drblob_content:blob_name
Select the user being displayed as author of the record
Normaly the author of a record is set automatilly, but in some cases it might be useful to be able to change this value, for example when you are creating records instead of your collegue
Version-Flag of the current record
This field shows up the title of the version of the current file.
Determine whether to store the file in the database or in the filesystem of the server

Both opinions have advantages and disadvantages. Storing the file in the database ensures that the file isn't changed. It also avoids that the file can be recived via URL hacking. Storing the file in the file system is faster, but if the plugin isn't configured correctly the file may be downloaded via URL hacking by non-authorized users.
Set this field to avoid the current record from being shown.
tx_drblob_content:starttime, tx_drblob_content:endtime, tx_drblob_content:fe_group
The "Start" time determines the date from which the record will be available online.
tx_drblob_content:hidden, tx_drblob_content:endtime, tx_drblob_content:fe_group
The "End" time determines the date from which the record will NOT be available online anymore.
tx_drblob_content:hidden, tx_drblob_content:starttime, tx_drblob_content:fe_group
Restrict access on this record

If "Access" is set to a usergroup name, only website users which are members of the selected usergroup will be able to view the record when they are logged in. The special option "Hide at login" means this record will NOT be visible for website users that are logged in. Likewise "Show at login" will make entry visible for any logged in frontend user.
tx_drblob_content:hidden, tx_drblob_content:starttime, tx_drblob_content:endtime
The language of the file record.
This should be the default language unless this record is a translation of another record. Use [ALL] to show the record with every language version.
tt_content:sys_language_uid,pages:sys_language_uid,pages_language_overlay:sys_language_uid
The record in the default language where the current record is a translation from.
You should not change this field manually because it is handled by the TYPO3 localization system.
Show this record in a "Best-of"-list

This checkbox prepares the record to be shown on the TOP-List of your website. If the hook is not set the record won't be listed in a top list. (Of course the list must be configured to search for records in the current sysfolder)
Enter a description for the file
This field can be used to enter additional information for the file you want offer.
Use this field to categorize a record.
Categorization helps users to find the information they are interested in.
tx_drblob_catgegory:title
Counts how often the file has been downloaded.
This read only field shows the number of times an attached file has been downloaded yet. Use the according button to reset it to zero.
Filename used when downloading the file

This field is filled automatically when a file is uploaded. Enter the filename that is used when the attached file is downloaded after uploading a file. Everytime a file is uploaded for the current record the value of this field will be overwritten by the filename of the uploaded file.
tx_drblob_content:blob_data
Checksum of the file. Stored automatically.
This field is filled out automatically. It contains information that may be useful for a person downloding this file to validate its authenticity
tx_drblob_content:blob_data
Size of the file. Stored automatically.
This field is filled out automatically. It contains information needed by the client browser when downloading the file
tx_drblob_content:blob_data
Mimetype of the file. Stored automatically.
This field is filled out automatically. It contains information needed by the client browser when downloading the file
tx_drblob_content:blob_data
Select the file you want to attach.

Every record represents a single file, combined with meta information. The file itself can be uploaded using this field. Once the record is saved, the file has been uploaded to the server. You do not need to keep it on your local harddisc.
tx_drblob_content:blob_name, tx_drblob_content:blob_size, tx_drblob_content:blob_type, tx_drblob_content:blob_checksum
